content:
Jeremy said
The topic line describes it all. :)

No, it does not because you have not said where you are dragging the email address from.

I can not see dragging being valuable in the contact pane as a right click on the entry make the arrival in BCC on the next click. no mess no fuss. Or you could use the buttons at the bottom of that list to do the same thing. But it does work in V140 (do do not say where you issue comes in but I did try in in the daly developer build and it works.

SO how do you do this thta I may be able to actually see what you are experiencing.
